arts.ttl: How 5 elite pundits saw Celtic misery in Dortmund as Owen Hargreaves drops truth bomb with 'relegation' scenario floated
arts.sum: The European football experts along with a couple of big Celtic names picked the bones out of Dortmund battering

arts.ttl: What Nuri Sahin and Dortmund's players are telling German media about Celtic match
arts.sum: Celtic quickly found out just how brutal even this new format of the Champions League can be with a 7-1 drubbing away to Borussia Dortmund on Tuesday night. Midfielder Emre Can, who scored from the penalty spot to put Dortmund 1-0 up in the match, told the broadcaster: “There is no such thing as a perfect game, but today it was very, very good.

arts.ttl: Peter Schmeichel shares what he told his son after Celtic conceded seven against Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: What Peter Schmeichel told Kasper after Celtic lose 7-1 to Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League Before the match, Peter Schmeichel thanked Brendan Rodgers for signing his son, as well as starting him at Signal Iduna Park.

arts.ttl: World media reacts as Celtic take a 'big slap' from Dortmund 'steamroller' while Brendan Rodgers question goes global
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers finds himself under the European microscope after another top level leathering

arts.ttl: Celtic tick every box on the brutal bingo card as Dortmund 7 anything but lucky
arts.sum: Another heavy Champions League defeat under Brendan Rodgers tells same old miserable story

arts.ttl: Callum McGregor fronts up with honest admission on Celtic's Dortmund disaster
arts.sum: It was a Tuesday night to forget for Celtic in the Champions League after being humbled by Borussia Dortmund. We’ve been sobered a little, but we need to take that and bounce back in the next game.

arts.ttl: Nike Dortmund Concept Kit Based On Inter Milan 24-25 Third Kit Design
arts.sum: On the day Inter Milan launched their 24-25 third kit, the official English BVB account @BlackYellow retweeted it because yellow and black are familiar colors for Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Martin Keown savages Brendan Rodgers as Celtic boss told to stop Champions League pretence and 'sort it out'
arts.sum: There was nowhere to hide for Brendan Rodgers and his side in Dortmund

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Karim Adeyemi Scores Hat Trick as Dortmund Decimate Celtic 7-1
arts.sum: When it looked like the second half might end scoreless, Serhou Guirassy popped up with a very impressive goal as a result from some quick footwork and a quick-taken finish inside the box. Shortly after, in the 9th minute, Dortmund found themselves level 1-1 after Daizen Maeda managed to scrape a cross across the goal line after a very suspect clearing-attempt from Emre Can. What happened next can only be described as Karim Adeyemi somehow ascending and become the one true football God no one expected he could be.

arts.ttl: Bruised Brendan Rodgers claims Celtic were 'SPOOKED' by Dortmund demolition but boss will never park the bus
arts.sum: The Irishman watched his side hammered on another chastening away night for the club in Europe
